title: Passion
description: Alternate Cover Edition: B00EFB84EYA young and innocent Brooke, from a small New England town loses her innocence. That was the end of her life as she knew it, after meeting Jonathon, her life was filled with lust, desire,heartbreak, fear, rejection and scandal. Brooke isn't sure if she will lose her life or just herself.
author: Abbey K. Davies
